short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: All downloads overwrite existing files instead of adding ' (1)', ' (2)', etc. Includes fix to remember folders.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The extension automates file updates in production by overwriting the existing recipe file with the latest one when a new part is loaded, ensuring efficiency in production line workflows.
